Headline: Temporary Eastbound #55 Garfield Reroute near 55th/Normal
ShortDescription: Eastbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted due to street blockage, near 55th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Halsted, 59th, Wentworth, 55th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 55th/Normal.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
